title: Dungeon Sounds - Audio Pack
description: 100 High Quality Audio files for your Dungeon!
longDescription:
Hello there!


This is my pack of dungeon sounds, I thought of situations that can normally occur with this scenario in mind.


Stone puzzles, steps on rocks, water, rivers, among others, here is the complete list of pack folders:


  • Dig_01
  • Error_Puzzle_01
  • Fire_01
  • Flashlight_01
  • FootStep_Grass_01
  • FootStep_Rocks_01
  • Giant_Monster_01
  • Large_Rock_Fall_01
  • Large_Rock_Fall_02
  • Lever_01
  • Lever_02
  • Lever_03
  • Light_Fail_01
  • Locked_Gate_01
  • Old_Gate_01
  • Old_Switch_01
  • Pick_Up_Keys_01
  • Pipe_Gurgle_01
  • Pulley_01
  • Pushing_Stone_01
  • Pushing_Stone_02
  • River_01
  • Rope_01
  • Solved_Puzzle_01
  • SoundScape_01
  • Spiders_Running_01
  • Stone_Door_01
  • Throw_Rock_01
  • Torch_01
  • Torch_02
  • Tremor_01
  • Tremor_02
  • Water_Drop_01
  • Water_Drop_02


Each folder, except for soundscape has 3 files inside, but you only pay for one, as two of them are variations of the original :)


Check the preview

Check the documentation
